ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Damage Prevention Holds Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Damage Prevention Holds') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True,
OR( ISBLANK( NS_ShipperContacted__c ), ISBLANK(ContactId) , ISBLANK(NS_CorrectiveAction__c) , ISBLANK(NS_CustomerContactNotifiedOfResolution__c) , ISBLANK(NS_CustomerNotifiedDateTime__c) , ISBLANK(NS_ShipperContactName__c) , ISBLANK(NS_ShipperContacted__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Contact Name, Corrective Action, Customer Contact Notified, Date Customer Notified, Shipper Contact Name, and Shipper Contacted prior to closing the Case.
